original_title: All About Astronauts / All About Cowboys
overview: ASTRONAUTS If you’ve ever wanted to know what it’s like to be a real astronaut…then you’ll love this high-flying adventure. Take a trip to the U.S. Space Camp in Huntsville, Alabama, and learn what it takes to earn your wings. You’ll simulate a helicopter crash landing… Strap yourselves in for an out-of-this world adventure that’ll make you shout: SOMEDAY I WANNA BE AN ASTRONAUT!  COWBOYS If you’ve ever wondered how real cowboys learn their crafts, then you’ll love this frontier adventure. Ride on down to Evans Ranch in Evergreen, Colorado, and discover what you need to know to be a real buckaroo! You’ll learn lots of different lariat swings.. Sit tall in the saddle for this fun-on-the-range adventure that’ll make you say: SOMEDAY I WANNA BE A COWBOY!
title: All About Astronauts / All About Cowboys
